glosses: any other person than oneself; others, other people
any other person than the oneself and the people the spoken to

examples.translation: other people are talking about us

glosses: any person that the one does not know or recognize, strangers, foreigners
any person that is not a part of one's nation, tribe, family, clan etc.

examples.text: el âlem uzaya çıkıyor, biz yerimizde sayıyoruz
examples.translation: while foreigners (people from other countries) are going to space, we are not developing

etymology: According to Tietze, from el (“other people”) + âlem (“realm”). Nişanyan rejects this etymology and instead suggests the word el is the Arabic article ال (al-, “the”).
